snippet: As the number of home-schooling families grows, they are building partnerships with museums to bolster their educational opportunities.
abstract: Museums are building partnerships with home-schooling families, seeking to bolster educational opportunities by offering on-site programs during off-peak hours that make use of abundant institutional resources.
lead_paragraph: As the number of home-schooling families grows, they are building partnerships with museums to bolster their educational opportunities.

headline.main: The Home-Schooled Don’t Just Stay at Home
headline.print_headline: The Home-Schooled Don’t Just Stay at Home
